title: Island Chill Vegetarian Eatery
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Take-out
description: Manitoulin Island vegetarian restaurant. Offers paninis, subs, wild salads, wraps, 3-bean chili haystack, pizza, burritos, falafel, sunflower-hemp burgers, maple-ginger, Thai tofu stir fry with noodles or rice, real fruit smoothies, and desserts. Special theme nights. Live music sometimes. Indoor seating along with a sheltered patio (for summer months).
